ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] How do you camp items and spawns?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... out some good stuff to camp/quests to do, etc. ... Actually, there are some features there that are still free. And there are guides for specific classes
ygData.messageBody:
>I guess I should go to Alakhazam and even pay the subscription fee to find
out some good stuff to >camp/quests to do, etc.
>
Actually, there are some features there that are still free. And there are
guides for specific classes on other sights I think.
>
>I guess you decide upon a target and then spend a ridiculous amount of time
waiting for it to show up.
>
Yup.
>
>Like a classic target is Grenix Mucktail, who drops the Polished Granite
Tomahawk. I suppose in order to >camp the PGT you just keep killing all the
gnolls in the area that Grenix spawns until he does and then you kill >him
and get the Tomahawk. I don't think that is very productive for a level 30
ranger to do, but it would be >good practice. I suppose you would make some
money from the items the gnolls dropped as well. Maybe I >will camp the orcs
on the other side to see if that guy who drops the weight reduction bag
shows up.
>
The PGT isn't that hard to get. I got it and the cracked darkwood shield a
few times. It's more fun if you are in a gnoll killing group for xp or
faction.
>
>It seems like an enchanter is a better character for getting into groups
and being invited on epic encounters, but >a ranger is better for doing
quests and camping items.
>
Since my mains are a cleric and a wizard, I wouldn't know.
luv,
-Su
